[vc_section white_text_color=”yes” wn_parallax=”content-moving” wn_parallax_speed=”190″][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp” layer_animation=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1525179238911{background-color: rgba(0,153,153,0.38) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,153,153) !important;}”][vc_column_text]

OUR VISION

To be a life-transforming church that proclaims the kingdom of God.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

OUR MISSION

REACH people for Christ

REFRESH belivers by the word of God

REFINE belivers for good works

RELEASE believers to transform the world[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1619899976099{padding-top: 8% !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;background-color: rgba(45,134,45,0.57) !important;*background-color: rgb(45,134,45) !important;}”][vc_column_text]

OUR CORE VALUES

Prayer

People

Passion

Performance[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
